#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cassert>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

#define LL long long int
#define PII pair<int,int>
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define INF 1000000000LL
#define BIG (10000000000000000LL)
#define debug(args...) do {cerr << #args << ": "; dbg,args; cerr << endl;} while(0)

bool valid(LL cur, LL mul) {
    if(cur <= BIG/mul + 1) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

bool isSq(LL num) {
    LL sq = (LL)sqrt(num) - 2;
    while(sq*sq < num) {
        sq++;
    }
    return (sq*sq) == num;
}

set < LL > nums;
int main() {
     ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
    for(LL i=2; i<=300000; i++) {
        LL cur = i*i;
        nums.insert(cur);
        while(valid(cur,i)) {
            cur *= i;
            if(cur <= BIG) {
                nums.insert(cur);
            }
        }
    }
    LL t,num;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>num;
        if(nums.find(num) != nums.end() || isSq(num)) {
            cout<<"YES\n";
        } else {
            cout<<"NO\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
